Hotchpot.definition: the combining of properties into a common lot to ensure equality of division among those entitled to a share of an estate which requires that advancements
Hotchpot.origin: [Anglo-French hochepot , from Old French, thick soup or stew, from hochier to shake + pot pot]

1.definition: the combining of properties into a common lot to ensure equality of division among those entitled to a share of an estate which requires that advancements (as to a child) be made up to the estate by contribution or by an accounting compare
